forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 62. West wind 15 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 52. Northwest wind 15 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco basks in a crisp afternoon, where sunshine bathes the urban landscape in a golden glow, hinting at the gentle warmth of a pleasant fall day. With winds brushing through the avenues, the air carries a refreshing clarity that calls for an invigorating stroll. The Bay glistens, reflecting a cerulean sky dotted with soft, puffy clouds—a fitting backdrop to the majestic sight of the Golden Gate Bridge. Clarity reigns supreme today, with visibility stretching toward distant hills, each detail sharp against the backdrop of the vibrant blue.

As dusk approaches, expect the nocturnal chill to return, wrapping the city in a cool embrace, reminiscent of cozy sweater weather. Dressing in layers becomes prudent; a light jacket and a scarf will serve well whether venturing out to enjoy a quiet coffee at an outdoor café or preparing for an evening at one of the city's many art galleries. The absence of fog today offers an ideal opportunity to explore, perhaps finding a vantage point to watch the sunset paint the skyline, as the day gracefully unfolds towards a peaceful evening.
